doc.previous: According to the census of 1998 the religious breakdown of the city was Muslim 96 45 Christian 2 42 Hindu 0 86 Ahmadiyya 0 17 others 0 10 Parsis Sikhs Bah s Jews and Buddhists 114
doc.after: Karachi is a tourist destination for domestic and international tourists Some tourist attractions near Karachi city are  Beaches The beaches of Karachi are the main attraction for tourists There are many beautiful seasides near city like Seaview Manora Island Sandspit Beach Hawke s Bay Beach Paradise Point French Beach Cape Monze and Nathiagali Beach
